text: Shikashi shinkō no nai mono wa, sono suru koto nasu koto, sabaku no naka no shinkirō no yōna mono de, kawaki kitta mono ni wa mizuda to omowa reru. Daga yattekureba nani mo midasenai. Sokode wa arrā no gozendeari, kare no kanjō ga harawa reru koto o shirudearou. Arrā wa seisan ni jinsokude ara reru
